translations: v.滥用；虚度；浪费（misspend 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Much of the money was grossly misspent.
A clean house is a sign of a misspent life.
sentences.translation: 一间干净的房子是一个浪费的人生的标志。

sentences.sentence: Money misspent one year is clawed back the next.
sentences.translation: 今年浪费的钱财要在下一年设法加以弥补。
